ASYNC-MHI-Q1.header: We’re here to help you feel better

listItems: About 1 in 5 Americans take medication for their mental health.
Your Zealthy mental health care team can review your responses and make sure you’re on the right path towards better mental health.

ASYNC-MHI-Q3.header: Taking a deeper look at yourself
listItems: These simple screens will help you better understand your mental health.
In just a few screens, you’ll see your results and if we can help you feel like the best version of yourself.
These questions will allow you to quantify your symptoms, so your Zealthy provider can provider a diagnosis and create a customized treatment plan.
If prescribed, your medication will be sent directly to your home in discreet packaging.
